description: Auto-discovery file that links to all of the other files published by the system.

last_updated.description: Last time the data in the feed was updated in POSIX time.

ttl.description: Number of seconds before the data in the feed will be updated again (0 if the data should always be refreshed).

data.description: Response data in the form of name:value pairs.

feeds.description: An array of all of the feeds that are published by the auto-discovery file. Each element in the array is an object with the keys below.
